item.title: Galleries/Portfolios
item.dc:creator: buddywp
item.content:encoded:
You can create galleries and portfolios using the powerful [[posts]] shortcode that comes with buddy. Below are a few examples of what you can do with the shortcode, but it is capable of doing much more. For all the shortcode options click here.

[divider]

Gallery Example 1

[posts name="gal1" cols="5" per_page="5" excerpt_length="50" meta="false" title_size="12" image_wrap="false"] [[posts name="gal1" cols="5" per_page="5" excerpt_length="50" meta="false" title_size="12" image_wrap="false"]] [divider]

Gallery Example 2

Gallery Example 4

Option Values Default Value Required Description
type blank, separate, joint blank The type of column
text_align text-left, text-right, text-center text-left The text alignment in columns
height The height of your columns in px, em or %
padding The column padding in px, em or % (top,right,bottom,left e.g 20,10,20,50)
margins The column margins in px, em or % (top,right,bottom,left e.g 20,10,20,50)
background The background colour and/or image of your column (e.g. background="#eee" or background="#000 url(IMAGE URL)")
border true, false true Choose whether to display a border around joint and separate columns

url Yes The URL of your image
width The width of your image

height The height of your image
link The link to your image
target _self, _blank Choose whether your link opens in a new window
border true, false true Choose whether to display a border around your image
align alignleft, alignright, aligncenter The alignment of your image
margins The image margins in px, em or % (top,right,bottom,left e.g. 10,20,15,10)
top The top position of your image
bottom The bottom position of your image
left The left position of your image
right The right position of your image
alt The alternate image text
title The link title
lightbox none, image, video none Choose what the lightbox content is
preload true, false false Choose whether your image preloads

Code Excerpt

function excerpt($limit) {
	$excerpt = explode(' ', get_the_excerpt(), $limit);
	if (count($excerpt)>=$limit) {
		array_pop($excerpt);
		$excerpt = implode(" ",$excerpt).'...';
	} else {
		$excerpt = implode(" ",$excerpt);
	}
	$excerpt = preg_replace('`[[^]]*]`','',$excerpt);
	return $excerpt;
}
[clear] 
<pre>function excerpt($limit) {
	$excerpt = explode(' ', get_the_excerpt(), $limit);
	if (count($excerpt)>=$limit) {
		array_pop($excerpt);
		$excerpt = implode(" ",$excerpt).'...';
	} else {
		$excerpt = implode(" ",$excerpt);
	}
	$excerpt = preg_replace('`[[^]]*]`','',$excerpt);
	return $excerpt;
}</pre>

item.content:encoded:
Rapidiously plagiarize resource sucking innovation rather than future-proof e-services. Dynamically re-engineer competitive methodologies through enabled opportunities. Rapidiously disseminate B2C total linkage through leveraged core competencies. Progressively disseminate vertical methodologies through impactful synergy. Phosfluorescently create frictionless solutions without resource-leveling infomediaries.
Quickly administrate worldwide metrics via accurate content. Globally re-engineer best-of-breed partnerships without an expanded array of potentialities. Rapidiously disintermediate an expanded array of experiences for flexible value. Completely mesh cost effective portals through 24/7 users. Quickly utilize diverse meta-services and user friendly processes.
Holisticly incentivize scalable channels after collaborative networks. Uniquely expedite virtual web services through real-time synergy. Conveniently administrate cross-media methodologies with vertical opportunities. Assertively fabricate real-time.
